Products do not harm people or the environment

To reach a sustainable future, every company must ensure all of the products and services it offers are benign to people and nature, both during use and during the post-use processing (recycling or disposal) of any materials involved.

This is achieved by updating designs to ensure that physical products don't have properties which make them harmful to human health or the environment, and that services don't encourage behaviours that are damaging to the wellbeing of individuals, society, or the environment.
